alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northern Arctic Coast; Northwest Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 01 at 5:38AM AKST until January 05 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. Blowing snow will reduce visibility to near zero at times. * WHERE...Northwest Arctic Coast, Northern Arctic Coast, Central Beaufort Sea Coast and Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northern Arctic Coast; Northwest Arctic Coast
